title: Norditalia font ID
content:
Can anybody please identify [this font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821122349/http:/a961.ac-images.myspacecdn.com/images01/60/l_5e995c991ee11162792da51b0fedb278.jpg) or direct me to a similar one?

 [‹ Stillwater font ID](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821122349/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45463 "Go to previous forum topic") [Studio 8: At This Rate Awareness Campaign Typeface Inquiry ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821122349/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45459 "Go to next forum topic")
author: zap_rowsdower

comments.content: [Tannenberg Fett](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821122349/http:/www.dafont.com/tannenberg-fett.font) by Dieter Steffmann isn’t to far off.
